TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicDataRoute extends System.Web.Routing.Route

summary.span: 表示 ASP.NET Dynamic Data 所使用的路徑。

span.span: Represents a route that is used by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用路由來設定動態資料行為。You use routes to configure Dynamic Data behavior. 靜態屬性類型為路由的集合。The static property of the type holds a collection of routes. 動態資料，通常會向註冊一或多個路由 (加入屬性) 中`Application_Start`Global.asax 檔案中的事件。For Dynamic Data, one or more routes are typically registered (added to the property) in the `Application_Start` event in the Global.asax file. 比方說，路由會判斷是否應該與資料列的清單在相同頁面上顯示的資料列的詳細資料。For example, routes determine whether the details for a row of data should be shown on the same page as the list of rows. 它們也可以判斷是否為資料列的某些資料表，但不是會針對其他清單在相同頁面上顯示詳細資料。They can also determine whether details should appear on the same page as the list of rows for some tables but not others. 您設定， ， ，以及屬性，並提供一種模式中的 URL建構函式。You set the , , , and properties and provide a pattern for the URL in the constructor. 動態資料會使用您提供為符合要求的 URL 模式，並建立 Url 的 URL 模式。Dynamic Data uses the URL pattern that you provide to match URL patterns for requests and to create URLs. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

span.span: How to: Define a Route

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string url) cil managed

span.span: The pattern for the URL.

summary.span: 使用指定的 URL 模式，初始化 類別 (Class) 的新執行個體 (Instance)。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified URL pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您可以指定動態資料將會建立使用替代參數的 Url。Typically, you specify the URLs that Dynamic Data will create by using substitution parameters. 比方說，如果您傳遞字串"{table} / {action}"，則結果會是 URL"~ / Products/ListDetails.aspx 」 使用 ListDetails 動作檢視 [產品] 資料表時。For example, if you pass the string "{table}/{action}", the result would be the URL "~/Products/ListDetails.aspx" when you view the Product table by using the ListDetails action. 使用替代參數不是必要的。Using substitution parameters is not required. 您可以傳遞字串"資料表/動態"，這會產生 「\~/Table/DynamicData.aspx"。You could pass the string "Table/DynamicData", which would produce "\~/Table/DynamicData.aspx". 您可以傳遞 「 MyPageName 」 產生 「\~/MyPageName.aspx"。You could pass "MyPageName" to produce "\~/MyPageName.aspx". 動態資料不會依賴 URL 來判斷資料表和動作的資訊。Dynamic Data does not rely on the URL to determine table and action information.

summary.span: 取得或設定路徑的動作名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of an action for a route.
The action name for a route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需可能的動作名稱的清單，請參閱。For a list of possible action names, see . 當您建立的執行個體時如果您未設定這個屬性，路由會套用到所有的動作。If you do not set this property when you create an instance of , the route will apply to all actions.

The routing information for the Web request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `httpContext`參數提供，如此就可以識別要求的資料表和動作所需的 Web 要求資訊。The `httpContext` parameter provides Web request information that is required so that the requested table and action can be identified.

summary.span: 取得或設定路徑套用的資料模型。

span.span: Gets or sets the data model to which the route applies.

value.span: 路徑套用的資料模型中繼資料。

span.span: The data-model metadata that the route applies to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立的執行個體時如果您未設定這個屬性，針對已註冊的預設模型會使用執行個體。If you do not set this property when you create an instance of , the default model for the registered instance is used.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::DynamicData::DynamicDataRouteHandler ^ RouteHandler { System::Web::DynamicData::DynamicDataRouteHandler ^ get(); void set(System::Web::DynamicData::DynamicDataRouteHandler ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定處理路由要求的物件。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that processes requests for the route.

value.span: 用來處理路徑要求的處理常式。

span.span: The handler that is used to process requests for the route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性等於屬性。The property is identical to the property. 它提供了強型別版本方便撰寫程式碼的屬性。It is provided as a strongly typed version of the property for coding convenience.

value.span: 與路徑相關聯的資料表名稱。

span.span: The name of the table that is associated with the route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立的執行個體時如果您未設定這個屬性，路由會套用至所指出的資料模型中的所有資料表。If you do not set this property when you create an instance of , the route will apply to all tables in the data model that are indicated by .

summary.span: 取得或設定與路徑相關聯的 .aspx 頁面名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the .aspx page that is associated with a route.

value.span: 與路徑相關聯的 .aspx 頁面名稱。

span.span: The name of the .aspx page that is associated with the route.

value.span: 如果未指定路徑的頁面，這個屬性會以頁面後面加上 ".aspx" 的方式傳回 屬性的值。

span.span: If no page is specified for the route, the property returns the value of the property with ".aspx" appended to it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 動態資料會使用數個標準的.aspx 頁面名稱，來建立 UI，讓使用者檢視、 更新和刪除指定的資料表中的資料。Dynamic data uses several standard .aspx page names to create the UI to let users view, update, and delete data from a given table. 這些頁面名稱包括 List.aspx、 Details.aspx、 Edit.aspx、 Insert.aspx 和 ListDetails.aspx。These page names include List.aspx, Details.aspx, Edit.aspx, Insert.aspx, and ListDetails.aspx. 屬性會指定其中一個這些頁面應使用指定的資料表和動作。The property specifies which of these pages should be used for a given table and action.
